instructions.warning: We have a bug. On your first connection of speaker module, your phone will redial your last caller. (Chinese)
instructions.connect: To connect speaker module go to settings -> bluetooth -> then pair Moduware speaker
instructions.steps: To ensure this only happens once go to settings -> connections -> bluetooth, then select Moduware Speaker and switch off call audio (Chinese)

main.start: To start use speaker module turn it on (Chinese)
